context.rdfs:comment: A listing that describes a job opening in a certain organization.
context.rdfs:label: JobPosting

properties.rdfs:comment: A (typically single) geographic location associated with the job position.
properties.rdfs:label: jobLocation

properties.rdfs:comment: Description of benefits associated with the job.
properties.rdfs:label: benefits

properties.rdfs:comment: Specific qualifications required for this role.
properties.rdfs:label: qualifications

properties.rdfs:comment: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.
properties.rdfs:label: incentiveCompensation

properties.rdfs:comment: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).
properties.rdfs:label: workHours

properties.rdfs:comment: Description of benefits associated with the job.
properties.rdfs:label: jobBenefits

properties.rdfs:comment: Publication date for the job posting.
properties.rdfs:label: datePosted

properties.rdfs:comment: Skills required to fulfill this role.
properties.rdfs:label: skills

properties.rdfs:comment: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.
properties.rdfs:label: incentives

properties.rdfs:comment: Educational background needed for the position.
properties.rdfs:label: educationRequirements

properties.rdfs:comment: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.
properties.rdfs:label: specialCommitments

properties.rdfs:comment: Category or categories describing the job. Use BLS O*NET-SOC taxonomy: http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html. Ideally includes textual label and formal code, with the property repeated for each applicable value.
properties.rdfs:label: occupationalCategory

properties.rdfs:comment: Description of skills and experience needed for the position.
properties.rdfs:label: experienceRequirements

properties.rdfs:comment: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).
properties.rdfs:label: employmentType

properties.rdfs:comment: The industry associated with the job position.
properties.rdfs:label: industry
